1.0.5

  • Resolves a crash on empty linear-gradient() functions.

1.0.4

  • Resolves an issue where 0 was being removed from intermediate colour stops if preceding colour stops contained calc() (thanks to @jaybekster).

1.0.3

  • Resolves an issue where 0 was being incorrectly stripped from the final colour stop value.

1.0.2

  • Resolves an issue where the module would incorrectly parse floating point numbers.

1.0.1

  • Reduce function iterations (thanks to @TrySound).

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
